html:
11.1.23  6:29 am   My favourite word is zeitgeist it is very pleasing to say. i recommend saying it now

      i find that the word zeitgeist was more pleasing before it was part of the zeitgeist, which i actually didn't know about either, before then

11.1.23  5:39 am   i'm way too distracted to do the right things do you have anything that helps you snap back into place when you have ever had that issue or did/does it just... happen 

     there is a famous technique that is supposed to work very well, which is to prepare a large bowl of ice water and dip your face into it for several seconds. if you don't have the resources handy to prepare a large bowl of ice water, as an alternative you can put your face in a cold shower. this works surprisingly well as a sort of re-set to your mind and emotions

11.1.23  3:26 am   Opinion on slobbish fizz in Ohio?

      never heard of it

11.1.23  2:26 am   what is your opinion on penguins

      they are iconic

11.1.23  12:04 am   If Valentine's Day candy is the worst Halloween candy, Is Halloween candy the worst Easter candy? And is Easter candy the worst valentine's candy, like a form of holiday candy rock paper scissors? 

      my reason for suggesting valentine's day candy as the worst halloween candy is based on the likelyhood that any valentine's day candy you can find on october 31 is likely to be fairly old, because most valentine's candy is probably manufactured around the previous december (at the latest). It was tempting at first to suggest that christmas candy would be the oldest, but the fact is that most stores actually begin putting out the christmas candy on halloween day, and have already moved the halloween merchandise to the discount area. so it's actually quite likely that even an ordinary consumer would be able to find brand new christmas candy, on halloween day. by this logic, easter candy would actually be the best and freshest candy on valentine's day





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

10.31.23  10:03 pm   Do you prefer a routine? Or do you routinely change it up? I don't know a way out 

      sometimes the consistency is necessary because my brain would otherwise explode from too many choices

10.31.23  10:01 pm   I bought a small package of tealights and the cashier put them in the bag, but I said I don't need a bag and picked them up, out of the bag. He said, "Are you too good for a bag?" And instead of explaining that it feels awkward physically to carry something almost as light as a bag, inside a bag, I said, "yeh." And he said "Oh sorry, next time I will roll out the red carpet for you," and my response was, "Thank you." And he made a Psh sound. I walked out the car thinking what is wrong with me but by the time I got home I was like, wait, what is wrong with HIM?

Should I avoid that store now and forever or is it probably fine.

      it's fine

      because you are not good enough yet

      maybe you could do it and then don't eat the candy

      think about something else

10.31.23  11:05 am   I'm in a barren wasteland right now. Where is the next fruitful, wetland? (I'ts for business-related reasons)

      i don't know, because i don't know which barren wasteland you are in

10.31.23  9:17 am   are we right to derive meaning from your lyrics, or are they less intentional than that?

      the meaning is together with the music. if you're doing it without the music, i don't think i'd count on that to work properly

10.31.23  9:04 am   when is there

      could be soon, if you're up for it

10.31.23  4:43 am   do you like me cause I'm crazy

      crazy is generally a likeable quality, but i'm not sure

10.31.23  4:14 am   apparently your bing ai's favorite online content creator so i shall ask you something that bing asked "How do you balance your humor and seriousness in your videos and songs?" 

      that question is incoherent. humor and seriousness are so intrinsically intertwined that there is no need to even try to balance them. they are self-balancing. everybody knows that

10.30.23  3:21 pm   i forgot to do a piece of homework, and now feel a sense of existential dread because of it. any advice?

      this will all make sense fairly soon, when you figure out what the consequences may be, and how that affects what you do in the future. there's many ways this could go, but it eventually all just adds up to wisdom for you, in one way or another

     sure

     Like for example to see if water still freezes when cold enough
